title: New game client, disconnecting after setting up masteries
body: So like in the Title i get disconnecting everytime i choose a masteries with new client, then i need to wait like 15second to be connected again to champ select. With old client everything is fine.

replies.body: Your network to champion select might failing  and losing sync, further affirmed by the inability to adjust masteries or ultimately disconnecting.  Run through the instructions in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help!  Let me know if you have any questions!
